item.life_contract.soul_contract.desc: Connects your soul to a species.
item.life_contract.faceless_deceiver_mas: §7Right-click a creature to establish a soul contract
§7- Gain all base attributes of the contract creature
§7- Some creatures' special abilities will be inherited
§7- Contract creature's status affects you in real-time
§cWhen the contract creature dies, you will be eliminated immediately!
§7- Can only contract one creature at a time
profession.life_contract.beast_rider.des: A master who forms special bonds with owned creatures. Can ride on the head of tamed creatures, controlling their movement and attacks. Cannot perform normal attacks while mounted.
profession.life_contract.gambler.desc: A master of fate. Use the dice to randomly trigger skills from other professions. Every roll is an unknown adventure.
profession.life_contract.faceless_deceiv: A mysterious contractor. Can establish a soul contract with one creature, gaining all its attributes and special abilities, but will be eliminated when the contract creature dies.
faceless_deceiver.mask.only_mob: §c[Faceless Mask] Can only establish contracts with creatures!
faceless_deceiver.mask.need_profession: §c[Faceless Mask] You need to select the Faceless Deceiver profession first!
faceless_deceiver.mask.only_faceless: §c[Faceless Mask] Only Faceless Deceivers can use this item!
faceless_deceiver.mask.already_contracte: §c[Faceless Mask] You have already established a contract with §e%s§c!
faceless_deceiver.mask.cannot_change: §7Cannot change contract until the contract creature dies.
faceless_deceiver.mask.already_owned: §c[Faceless Mask] This creature already has a contract with another Faceless Deceiver!
faceless_deceiver.mask.has_master: §c[Faceless Mask] This creature already has a master!
faceless_deceiver.system.already_contrac: §c[Faceless Deceiver] You already have a contract with a creature, cannot establish a new one!
faceless_deceiver.system.has_master: §c[Faceless Deceiver] This creature already has a master!
faceless_deceiver.system.contract_with: §f  You have established a soul contract with §e%s
faceless_deceiver.system.attribute_appli: §7  Contract creature's attributes have been applied to you
faceless_deceiver.system.death_warning: §c  Warning: When the contract creature dies, you will be eliminated immediately!
faceless_deceiver.system.death_broadcast: §c§l[Life Contract] §rFaceless Deceiver §e%s§c's contract creature §e%s§c has died, the Faceless Deceiver is eliminated immediately!
profession.life_contract.impostor.desc: A deadly deceiver. After killing an enemy player, immediately gains their appearance, name, and team color for 2 minutes. Skill cooldown: 3 minutes.
impostor.skill.hint: §7  Other players will see your name with the target's team color
impostor.skill.restored: §7  You have returned to your original appearance
profession.life_contract.ambush.desc: A mysterious tactical master. Can apply invisibility to creatures within range and teleport them to another area. Automatically enters invisibility after 10 seconds without attacking.
ambush.orb.only_ambush: §c[Ambush Orb] Only Ambush profession can use this item!
ambush.orb.need_profession: §c[Ambush Orb] You need to select the Ambush profession first!
ambush.orb.target_set: §b[Ambush Orb] §rTeleport target position set! Use again to execute range invisibility teleport.
ambush.orb.too_far: §c[Ambush Orb] §rTarget position exceeds teleport distance limit (%s blocks)!
